column5: While searching through my bookmarks for news worthy articles (and new tackle) I came upon the Gary Loomis story and saw that part 2 was now availbale so I thought I'd share the links for those who may be interested....  Gary Loomis Interview Part 1  Gary Loomis Interview Part 2
Great read Spiel! Thanks, I enjoyed that!

I have been waiting this for a while now. I have some blanks on the way from his new found company. Looking forward to getting them done for the upcoming season. Very light and super sensitive from what I hear.  Here is the link. http://www.northforkcomposites.com/index.html
If you’ve got time (and a relatively good internet connection), here’s another cool interview with Gary Loomis. It’s a podcast about 55min  http://www.itinerantangler.com/podcasts/podcast66.mp3
Very interesting articles.  Thanks Spiel.  I'd probably get a float rod blank if they offered it.
Excellent read.  Smart cat that Gary is.
Thanks for taking the time to post that Chris it was a good read.   Art
